page.title: 04RIPLEY NEWS.5th JULY 1985
page.content: {TEACHERS STRIKE HITS SCHOOLS. Lots of children missed school this week.Altogether,about 80 teachers in the area went on strike.2 classes from our school missed about an hour of school on Tuesday. {WHAT A STINK. A farmer's manure spreading could be smelled all over Ripley.One resident said it was disgusting.Farmers said it was hard to do this without a smell. {CUBS EXTENSION OPENED Mr Enoch Hutchinson cut the tapes to open the new extension to the cubs hall on Hill Street. {HIPPODROME CINEMA ATTRACTIONS. July 5th for 7 days:"The Cotton Club" Coming soon..........James Bond in "A View to a Kill"
